```{r, message = FALSE}
# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
# Read in data
aqi_ozone <- read_csv(here("Project Data", "Combined", "aqi_ozone_all_years.csv"))
```

```{r}
aqi_ozone <- aqi_ozone %>% 
  mutate(next_date = Date + 1)

aqi_lagged <- merge(aqi_ozone, aqi_ozone %>% select("Date", "AQI"), by.x = "next_date", by.y = "Date") %>% 
  rename(AQI_current = AQI.x, AQI_tomorrow = AQI.y)
```

```{r}
aqi_lagged
```
